alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:16PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Juab... southwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 416 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Elberta, or 25 miles west of Payson. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eureka and Tintic Junction. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 137 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
